com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.mock

Class MockUsbDcMotorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.mock.MockUsbDevice
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.mock.MockUsbDcMotorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DcMotorController

    public class MockUsbDcMotorController
extends MockUsbDevice
implements DcMotorController
    Mock USB DC Motor Controller This is an implementation of DcMotorController Use MockDeviceManager to create an instance of this class
